links.title: Explaining A Gamma Squeeze In Layman's Terms
links.description: A Gamma Squeeze has been a relatively new term that has been floated around the Stock Market as of late. It's been made popular as the best way to describe the crazy action in GameStop (GME) and AMC over the last few months.
